thread.title: Rs 1.6 cr for Raju Gari Gadhi’s satellite rights
thread.title_full: Rs 1.6 cr for Raju Gari Gadhi’s satellite rights - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rs 1.6 cr for Raju Gari Gadhi’s satellite rights
text:
While the trailers of Raju Gari Gadhi have been surprising all those who see it, the latest to surprise everyone is the satellite rights price of the film! Touted to be a horror comedy and directed by anchor-turned-director Omkar, the film has minted a whopping Rs 1.60 crores with MAA TV buying the rights.
With a low budget in the process of making the film, this amount is a sigh of relief for the makers who are eyeing huge profits even before the release due to a great deal of pre-release buzz.
